heTitleVariants: מגיד משנה על משנה תורה, הלכות מלווה ולווה
title: Maggid Mishneh on Mishneh Torah, Creditor and Debtor
enDesc: Written by Vidal of Tolosa, Maggid Mishneh is a commentary on Rambam’s Mishneh Torah. Although the original commentary covered the entire Mishneh Torah, only a portion is extant.
